June 9, 1991 D Swindon Entertainment Contest (Section 3)
Swindon Entertainment Contest (Section 3) 30 Entertainments Contest Swindon Entertainment Contest swindon-brass-festival-section-3
None
Wyvern Theatre, Swindon 1st prize: £125 and the J. Holmes Challenge Cup. 2nd prize: £75 and the J. Cordon Trophy. 3rd prize: £50 and the Swindon Brass Festival Cup. Best Soloist: Festival Trophy. Presentation/deportment: M. Stiles Trophy - Daw Mill Colliery.
Draw 9.15 am, commence 10 am.
For fourth and youth section bands.
May 26, 2013, 7:43 p.m. April 6, 2014, 3:11 p.m.
